message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. I think this is a great deal, considering its value to you is $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product but $12,000 is a bit high for my budget. Would you consider a lower price, perhaps closer to $10,000?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $10,000 is a bit below my minimum, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $11,500. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value to you is $15,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. While $11,500 is closer to what I had in mind, I'm still aiming for a price closer to $10,500. Would you be open to that?

I understand that you're trying to get as close to your target price as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $11,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me is $12,000. What do you think?
Alice, you've been very accommodating and I appreciate that.  However,  $11,000 is still a bit of a stretch for me.  Would you be willing to settle at $10,750?  I feel that's a fair compromise.

I understand that you're trying to get as close to your target price as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $10,900. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me is $12,000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value you place on the product. What do you think?
